HomePage.headerTitle:
Easy way to learn languages
The context you love is the best tutor!
HomePage.headerSubtitle: Try our app and enjoy learning
HomePage.contentPleasure: You can find lessons on TED, your favourite Youtube channel or Netflix show. Every article you read is full of new words and expressions. Fullfill your vocabulary with expressions that matter to you.
HomePage.contentMemory: Training is based on materials that you love and enjoy. We use context exactly from the video and articles you watched. Translation depends on context so you shouldn’t learn everything at once.
HomePage.contentOurApp: Easylang is a FREE extention for your browser and a training app for web and mobile.
HomePage.blog: To find some tips and learn more about Easylang visit
HomePage.contentSource: Choose anything you like and explore new words and expressions. We recommend to try Easylang with TED, Youtube, Netflix, all online magazines, blogs and your academic materials.
HomePage.musicParagraph: Find out what your favourite song is about
HomePage.bookParagraph: Read classic and modern literature in original

NotFoundPage.NotFoundSubtitle: Sorry, but the page you are looking for is not found. Please, make sure you have typed the correct URL.

ProductsPage.ProductsTopHeader: We help to learn the language for free. Do what you love - watch TV shows, read books, or listen to music.
ProductsPage.ProductsTopText:
Easy to start learning English:
- set up extension for browser;
- create an account in Tutor to work with content you like;
ProductsPage.ProductExtensionDescription:
- translate words, we help
to train words right on the page
ProductsPage.ProductTutorDescription:
- save words and sentences
to learn them on the way
ProductsPage.ExtensionDescription:
— works in Google Chrome
— translates everything you need
ProductsPage.ContextTutorDescription:
— easy mechanics of Tutor
— lessons are based on your reading and viewing history
— we help your contextual memory works
— suitable for learning terms
ProductsPage.BottomInfoText:
Still have questions?
Сontact us - we will surely help you!

ExtensionPage.GetStartedText:
Learn Languages and translate words
in Web Browser
ExtensionPage.GetStartedBottomText:
• Translate word and phrases within sentences
  • Revise words in context (that you have read it in)
  • Revise via games (available on mobile)
  • Expand your vocabulary
ExtensionPage.1-SlideExtensionBody: Every single article may become a worthy learning material to strengthen your knowledge in English. What’s more important is that you enjoy such content.
ExtensionPage.2-SlideExtensionBody: Translate a word, a phrase, or an entire sentence. Besides, we can quickly send the selected part for translation.
ExtensionPage.3-SlideExtensionBody: Keep the translation window open, we got hold on it the entire time.
ExtensionPage.4-SlideExtensionBody: Select “Save to Tutor” option, and we save it for comfortable learning.
ExtensionPage.5-SlideExtensionHeader:
In one place the whole
history of learning
ExtensionPage.5-SlideExtensionBody: You read a lot, but only some pages will be used to study English.
ExtensionPage.6-SlideExtensionHeader:
Repeat words
right in an article
ExtensionPage.6-SlideExtensionBody: Go back to the pages that interested you, and we conceal selected by you words for maximum effect to give you a chance to practice them. You may choose to reveal them if you want to.
ExtensionPage.7-SlideExtensionBody: Your Tutor history is a source for various games to repeat the words you selected to learn.
ExtensionPage.8-SlideExtensionBody: Your personal lessons will be divided into categories based on material you learned or the day you have selected them.
ExtensionPage.9-SlideExtensionBody: For the fast transition from PC to mobile, scan the QR code available under the “Open on mobile tab”.
ExtensionPage.10-SlideExtensionHeader:
And be mobile!
Don't waste your time!
ExtensionPage.10-SlideExtensionBody: Now you can revise material anywhere, with EasyLang games is way more fun!

ExtensionInstructionPage.1-InstructionParagraph-a: Now you can translate words and sentences in context.
ExtensionInstructionPage.1-InstructionCardHeading-a: Choose your language in the settings
ExtensionInstructionPage.4-InstructionCardParagraph-a: Words and sentences will be</br>translated by default
ExtensionInstructionPage.2-InstructionCardHeading-a: Choose content only in the language that you want to learn:
ExtensionInstructionPage.5-InstructionCardParagraph-a: Default settings block translations when the content</br>is in your native language. You can enable such</br>function in the settings.
ExtensionInstructionPage.1-InstructionCardHeading-b: Sign up and get access to all
ExtensionInstructionPage.3-InstructionCardParagraph-b: Play games and repeat new words
ExtensionInstructionPage.4-InstructionCardParagraph-b: You can view history to go back to the source
ExtensionInstructionPage.1-StepLeftHeading-c: Save new word to the context
ExtensionInstructionPage.1-StepLeftHeading-d: revise them on mobile device or

PlayerAnimation.stepInitialA: Find out, how this player works!
PlayerAnimation.step8B: or just a part, to translate

PlayerPage.GetStartedPlayerText:
The handy program
for learning language
PlayerPage.ScrolledContentPlayerHeader:
One more powerful tool
for learning English
PlayerPage.PlayerHeader:
Watch videos subtitle by subtitle
to practice your audition
PlayerPage.PlayerTopText:
Watch videos you like
Add subtitles in any languages
Don’t miss a phrase
PlayerPage.1-SlidePlayerBody: Our program supports *.mkv type files which can contain multiple syncronized subtitles. These files may also contain multiple audio components to complete experience.
PlayerPage.2-SlidePlayerBody: Not all video players give you option to choose different audio in a different language. We support MKV type files that contain multiple audio components. MKV files are usually Blu-Ray disk files with HD video footage.
PlayerPage.3-SlidePlayerBody:
Interpretive translation is a more accurate translation of phrases that have undermeaning to them. It will help you understand common slang and word play in the scene.
We hide some parts of translation so you can try yourself first. You will be able to check results by pressing eye icon.
PlayerPage.4-SlidePlayerBody: Sometimes word play will be confusing, so it's important to have Google Translate with you. While, our program will maximize comfort when during the use by allowing you to select any part of the text.
PlayerPage.5-SlidePlayerBody: We are strictly controlling video scroll so you don't have to mouse drag.
PlayerPage.6-SlidePlayerBody: It's easy to listen multiple times to the same video fragment with a simple click. This will help you develop your listening skills.
PlayerPage.7-SlidePlayerBody: You can choose any sentence, phrase or word and add them to your lessons for later.
PlayerPage.8-SlidePlayerBody: List on the side will help you navigate through the movie. You will also be able to see what you added to your lessons.
PlayerPage.9-SlidePlayerHeader:
To repeat words
just scan QR code
and go to games
PlayerPage.9-SlidePlayerBody: In order to play scan the QR code.
PlayerPage.10-SlidePlayerBody: Everything is in your usual browser. Now you can revise material anywhere, with games we created for you it will be way more fun!
PlayerPage.GetStartedBottomText:
• Translate word and phrases within sentences
  • Revise words in context (that you have read it in)
  • Revise via games (available on mobile)
  • Expand your vocabulary

PlansPage.PlansTitle: We are a free OpenSource startup that strives</br>to help people!
PlansPage.1-PlansSubtitle: Our company has to buy services from Google.</br>Consider supporting our efforts If you enjoy EasyLang by choosing our premium-services!
PlansPage.2-PlansSubtitle: We do not limit our common user experience, but it comes at a cost of comfort.
PlansPage.2-StandardPoint:
10 translations/day limit.
After we will send you
direct link to translation.
PlansPage.SuperPremiumSubtitle: Per month</br>if you pay $59.88 for year
